title: Login Authentication Issue
description: User unable to login with correct credentials. Getting authentication error repeatedly.

title: Payment Gateway Failure
description: Payment processing fails at checkout. Transaction gets declined without proper error message.

title: Email Notification Not Working
description: Users not receiving email confirmations after successful registration or purchase.

title: Mobile App Crashes
description: App crashes when trying to upload profile picture on iOS devices.

title: Search Function Not Working
description: Search bar returns no results even for existing products and services.

title: Password Reset Link Expired
description: Password reset links expire immediately after being sent to user email.

title: Dashboard Loading Slowly
description: User dashboard takes more than 30 seconds to load completely.

title: File Upload Size Limit
description: Cannot upload files larger than 1MB even though limit should be 10MB.

title: API Response Timeout
description: Third-party API integration timing out causing data sync issues.

title: User Profile Update Error
description: Error occurs when users try to update their profile information.

title: Shopping Cart Items Disappear
description: Items randomly disappear from shopping cart during browsing session.

title: Two-Factor Authentication Issue
description: 2FA codes not being sent to registered phone numbers.

title: Report Generation Failed
description: Monthly reports fail to generate and download for premium users.

title: Social Media Login Error
description: Google and Facebook login options not working properly.

title: Database Connection Timeout
description: Intermittent database connection issues causing service disruption.
